settings.sticky_fine_print: Add some fine print about checking out or more payment methods here.

settings.liquid:
Please Note: Orders that include backorder or pre-order items will ship complete once all items are available even if some of the items are in stock today. If you want to receive in stock items immediately you can move the backorder and pre-order items to a separate cart and place a second order. Don't hesitate to call or email if you would like some assistance processing this order.

settings.text: Have questions about your order? Email our support team at or check out our Help Center.
